title: Proposed M.R.I Scanner Unit for Lady Ridgeway Children?s Hospital Colombo - 08
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health to award the construction of a building for the installation of a M.R.I. Scanner Unit at the Lady Ridgeway Children's Hospital, Colombo, to the State Engineering Corporation, was approved by the Cabinet.
